problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that the straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, the straight line intersects the straight line a, b, c at the point A, B, C, the straight line n intersects the straight line a, b, c at the point D, E, F, if \frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{N_0}{N_1}, then \frac {DE}{EF} = ()
